name: One Level Geometry Invader
description:
Hi guys. 
This project is a demo game for an introduction to unity and programming in C# for absolute beginners. 
You are welcome to play the game and post your highest score.
If you are coming to this link from the lesson, do have a go at the game so you have a fair idea about how to play the game and what features your game shall have.

Thanks :)
NOTE: CLICK ON THE GAME TO START

Asset has been acquired from:

1. Neon Shape:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/neon-shapes-61454
